Class AV.Insight.JobQuery


Defined in: av.js.

Class Summary
Constructor Attributes Constructor Name and Description
 
AV.Insight.JobQuery(id, className)
创建一个对象，用于查询 Insight 任务状态和结果。
Method Summary
Method Attributes Method Name and Description
 
find(options)
查询任务状态和结果，任务结果为一个 JSON 对象，包括 status 表示任务状态， totalCount 表示总数， results 数组表示任务结果数组，previewCount 表示可以返回的结果总数，任务的开始和截止时间 startTime、endTime 等信息。
 
limit(n)
Sets the limit of the number of results to return.
 
skip(n)
Sets the number of results to skip before returning any results.
Class Detail
AV.Insight.JobQuery(id, className)
创建一个对象，用于查询 Insight 任务状态和结果。
Parameters:
{String} id
任务 id
className
Since:
0.5.5
Method Detail
{AV.Promise} find(options)
查询任务状态和结果，任务结果为一个 JSON 对象，包括 status 表示任务状态， totalCount 表示总数， results 数组表示任务结果数组，previewCount 表示可以返回的结果总数，任务的开始和截止时间 startTime、endTime 等信息。
Parameters:
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object options.success, if set, should be a function to handle a successful call to a cloud function. options.error should be a function that handles an error running the cloud function. Both functions are optional. Both functions take a single argument.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result of the function.
{AV.Query} limit(n)
Sets the limit of the number of results to return. The default limit is 100, with a maximum of 1000 results being returned at a time.
Parameters:
{Number} n
the number of results to limit to.
Returns:
{AV.Query} Returns the query, so you can chain this call.
{AV.Query} skip(n)
Sets the number of results to skip before returning any results. This is useful for pagination. Default is to skip zero results.
Parameters:
{Number} n
the number of results to skip.
Returns:
{AV.Query} Returns the query, so you can chain this call.
